subject: Steroids
Perjury
Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Barry Bonds’s former personal shopper became the first and only of the government’s 23 witnesses at his federal trial to say she saw him receive an injection from his trainer.
snippet: Barry Bonds’s former personal shopper became the first and only of the government’s 23 witnesses at his federal trial to say she saw him receive an injection from his trainer.
